title: The Sun shines over Lhasa
brief_description: Documentary about the Tibetan city of Lhasa, its people, culture, history and attractions as seen through the eyes of the Chinese communist government since its invasion and subsequent rule of the Tibetan people.
description: Documentary about the Tibetan city of Lhasa, its people, culture, history and attractions as seen through the eyes of the Chinese communist government since its invasion and subsequent rule of the Tibetan people.
